text: Tum jahan kahin bhi ho maut tumhen aa pakray gi go tum mazboor qilon mein ho aur gar enhen koi bhalaee milti hai to kehtay hain kay yeh Allah Taalaa ki taraf say hai aur agar koi buraee phonchti hai to to keh uthtay hain kay yeh teri taraf say hai. Enhen keh do kay yeh kuch Allah Taalaa ki taraf say hai. Enhen kiya hogaya hai kay koi baat samajhney kay bhi qarib nahi
